Evidence: Apache CXF can integrate with JMX using an InstrumentationManager extension. If the 'createMBServerConnectorFactory' property of the default InstrumentationManagerImpl is not disabled, it is vulnerable to MITM attacks. And the 'createMBServerConnectorFactory' property of the default InstrumentationManagerImpl is in org.apache.cxf:cxf-rt-management (https://github.com/apache/cxf/blob/5c64b7a10227d59cd61f9e61a64496e57bf2e1b6/rt/management/src/main/java/org/apache/cxf/management/jmx/InstrumentationManagerImpl.java#L59) and artifact org.apache.cxf:cxf-bundle contain org.apache.cxf:cxf-rt-management which is also affected

The name of the Go module is defined in the go.mod file, and the real module of kubernetes is called helm.sh:helm in go.mod (refered to the patach: https://github.com/helm/helm/commit/179f90151d5ecb4aa3d35ada35e82b5c1e791752)
